title: Latin Style Cabbage Slaw with Optional Feta

instructions.default: Enjoy cold or saute in an oiled as a veggie saute.
instructions.Pint / NO: Enjoy cold or saute in an oiled as a veggie saute.
instructions.Pint / Cheese: Enjoy cold or saute in an oiled as a veggie saute.
instructions.Frozen Pint / NO: Defrost. Best sauteed in an oiled skillet.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Cheese: Defrost. Best sauteed in an oiled skillet.
